alert.note: Alert for Macoupin; Madison (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 4:03PM CDT until May 13 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MADISON AND SOUTHEASTERN MACOUPIN COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN ILLINOIS... At 403 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Staunton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Staunton, Worden, Livingston, Alhambra, Wilsonville, and Williamson. This includes Interstate 55 in Illinois between exits 33 and 41. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
